description: The aim of this module is to deepen the knowledge of students who have foundational digital storytelling experience and expand on advanced principles of digital storytelling methods, platforms, academic discourse, reflection, and analysis. Students will utilise these principles through creative application across text, audio-visual, and social media. The culmination of the module will be a final portfolio project which combines theory with practice.
title: Digital Media Storytelling Strategies
prerequisite:
Completed 80 MCs, including 28 MCs in NM, with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or been on the Honours track.
NM3230
